programme.desc: Join us for the weekly church service conducted by David Jeremiah from San Diego, California, USA. Dedicated to providing sound, in-depth teaching of the Word of God verse by verse. Through his personable and expository teaching, pastor Dr David Jeremiah challenges viewers to take hold of the truths of God's Word for themselves and to apply it to the daily circumstances in their own life, by presenting God's truth in clear and practical applications.(n)

programme.title: Wesley Impact
programme.desc: Wesley Impact! (formerly Rise & Shine) is a half hour Christian television program. Hosted by Rev. Keith Garner, this series looks at the work of Wesley Mission at the grass roots with personal good-news stories shared by clients and staff within the various support services and programs they provide which are helping people get their lives back on track. Episodes also include featured guests from Australia and around the world, sharing their personal and inspirational stories of tackling life's challenges to emerge with a message of hope, victory and courage. Featuring an in-house band, led by Music Director Craig Gower, showcasing some of Australia's leading Christian artists, Wesley Impact! has everything you need.(n)

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.desc: Bayless Conley is a church leader and speaker, known for both his clear presentation of the Bible message and the way he applies it to everyday life. Bayless grew up in Southern California where, during his teenage years, he became involved in a lifestyle of drug and alcohol abuse. After years of searching for truth, and a number of near-death experiences, he found answers and freedom in Jesus when a 12-year-old boy shared God's message of hope with him in a park one day. Bayless' unique background and remarkable story have enabled him to reach a diverse audience globally. Today, the Answers with Bayless Conley broadcast is impacting lives around the world in numerous languages. Bayless is the founding and senior pastor of Cottonwood Church in Orange County, California. He and his wife, Janet, are the parents of three grown children, and enthusiastic grandparents. Together they passionately pursue life, God, and family. In Answers with Bayless Conley, Bayless offers clear and practical Bible teaching that helps viewers find answers for their life. His passion is to see the truth of God's Word set people free.(n)

programme.title: In Touch
programme.sub-title: E13 Down But Not Out - Those Feelings of Inadequacy
programme.desc: The In Touch program reaches the world with the Gospel with messages that tackle such issues as parenting, finances, personal crises, emotions, and relationships. Dr. Stanley fervently believes the Bible to be the inerrant Word of God, a belief strongly reflected in his teaching. Dr Charles Stanley is the author of more than 50 books.(n)

programme.title: PowerPoint with Dr. Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.(n)

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA; join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church, for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. Experience from the weekend church service of Lakewood Church, the largest and fastest growing church in America that is inspiring millions of people around the world!(n)

programme.title: The Blessed Life with Robert Morris
programme.desc: Gateway Church is a multicampus, nondenominational church in the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex led by Pastor Robert Morris. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 39,000 active members and six local campuses. Its vision is to see people saved, healed, set free, discipled, equipped, empowered, and serving. Its mission is to help each person at Gateway believe in Jesus, belong to family, become a follower, and build God's kingdom.(n)

programme.title: A Life of Victory
programme.sub-title: E520 The Holy Spirit and Power of God Pt1
programme.desc: Former tennis great Margaret Court is now as passionate about God and His love for people as she was about winning tennis. 'A Life of Victory with Margaret Court' includes empowering teaching, and uplifting contenporary Gospel music performed by the Victory Life worship team.(n)

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in God's Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry. Hear inspiration for change, healing, peace and joy through his affective communication connecting you to God, the church, and the world!(n)

programme.title: Joyce Meyer Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.sub-title: E59 How to Have Successful Relationships
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the world's leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.(n)

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart follows the adventures of a young teacher accustomed to her high-society life. She receives her first classroom assignment in Hope Valley, a small town in Western Canada. There, life is simple - but often fraught with challenges. Elizabeth must learn the ways of the rural west if she wishes to thrive on her own, but she soon learns that friendship and community are the source of love and life. In season 7 Elizabeth is enjoying being mother to a busy toddler and pursues a unique career opportunity. Lucas and Nathan let Elizabeth know how they feel about her, so will Elizabeth choose to pursue a romance with saloon owner Lucas or mountie Nathan this season? Meanwhile, Clara and Jesse plan their wedding, Lee reveals a big secret about his past to Rosemary, Nathan is confronted with his past when his father shows up in town, Bill has to put a jury together, Lucas and Gowen face problems with Gowen Petroleum, and Carson and Faith face some challenges in their relationship. Finally, our characters have to deal with more than just emotional slings and arrows as they tackle life in a pioneer town on the Canadian frontier.(n)

programme.title: I Can Only Imagine
programme.desc: What can you only imagine? Has something or someone left you feeling rejected, guilty, or broken? Before he became the lead singer of MercyMe, Bart Millard suffered a painful childhood. Abused by his father, Bart built walls around his heart. In the I Can Only Imagine Series, Bart shares his own personal story with you. He watched a monster become a godly man. He came face to face with his own brokenness, and he saw God transform a lifetime of hurt into a beautiful and enduring purpose.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Up Bates
programme.sub-title: E13 A Big Bates Thanksgiving Pt2
programme.desc: Get ready to give thanks... Bates style! The whole family heads to Gil's parents' farm for a super-sized family dinner. The family joins hands to say what they're thankful for. Someone reveals a surprise.(n)

programme.title: Joan of Arcadia
programme.desc: Millions of people speak to God. What if God spoke back? No one would ever believe Joan Girardi if she told them that God is talking to her. Does Joan have a higher purpose on earth, or are these strange conversations just in her head?(n)

programme.title: The Bulloch Family Ranch
programme.desc: Meet Julie and Rusty Bulloch, a fun-loving, working class couple that devotes their time and resources to help others. Julie and Rusty are the proud parents of 25 kids they have taken in to save from the streets and broken families, providing them with a home and love that helps them to flourish. This series follows the lives of the Bullochs starting with the arrival of two new troubled youths - football players Davin and Jordan. Usually Rusty and Julie identify the kids they want to help, but in Davin's case, a social worker asked the family to help him following some incidents with the law. In Jordan's case, it was biological-son, Brodie, who initiated inviting in Jordan because he saw that the teen was teetering on the brink. Julie and Rusty decided to follow their hearts and open their home once again.(n)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: In the supercharged world of dirt track racing, a single mistake causes the lives of two men to change forever. One must fight for his family, the other must fight to forgive.(n)

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.(n)

programme.title: The Catholic Guy
programme.sub-title: E135 Trust Your Way to a Better Future
programme.desc: Bruce Downes is The Catholic Guy. Bruce and his team will move, inspire and challenge you to live your life to the absolute fullest. No matter your age, situation or background, be prepared to laugh, learn and listen to what God is trying to say to you. Bruce travels Australia speaking regularly about his experiences in life and in the Church in a way that is both relatable and easy to understand. Bruce's message of power, impact, freedom and purpose is for anyone and everyone - for no matter where you are around the world today, God is never far from you.(n)

programme.title: Precious Memories
programme.sub-title: E17 Love Can Turn The World
programme.desc: Join Bill and Gloria Gaither and their special guests for a great sing-along of old time gospel music. Relax, as they journey back to a time when things were simple and lifetime memories were made. Howard & Vestal Goodman, James and Jimmy Blackwood, The Nelons, The Talleys, and other renowned Christian recording artists join Bill and Gloria in these nostalgia-filled video journeys.(n)

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: Pam Rhodes visits the historic city of Winchester, once the capital of England. She visits a world-famous potting shed and introduces soprano Elin Manahan Thomas and classic hymns from Winchester Cathedral, including Crown Him With Many Crowns and Great Is Thy Faithfulness.(n)

programme.title: Amish Grace
programme.desc: The inspirational true story of forgiveness. The peaceful Amish community of Nickel Mines is forever changed when a gunman senselessly takes the lives of five girls in a schoolhouse shooting before taking his own life. What transpires afterward takes the community by storm, as the media descend on the town and criticize its Amish leaders for their notion of unconditional forgiveness of the shooter and their outreach of support to his widow, Amy Roberts (Tammy Blanchard, Bella). Kimberly Williams-Paisley (TV's According to Jim and Father of the Bride 1 & 2), as mother of one of the five girls, leads a talented cast in the highest-rated original film ever to appear on the Lifetime Movie Network. Devastated by her daughter's death, Ida (Kimberly Williams-Paisley) finds herself struggling with her community's belief in the transcending power of forgiveness and faces a profound test of her faith. As she begins to feel like an outsider within her own community, Ida must decide whether or not to stay with the Amish - and her beloved husband (Matt Letscher). Delicately crafted and featuring poignant performances, this film, based on a true story, is a moving testament to the power of forgiveness.(n)

programme.title: Jesus the Game Changer
programme.desc: The sequel to the award-winning documentary Jesus the Game Changer is a 13 episode series, hosted by Karl Faase. Why did followers of Jesus take this message and risk danger and death to ensure people heard the Gospel? Follow along as Karl speaks to over 50 guests around the world about how and why the gospel spread to become a truly global faith. Be inspired by stories of faith and courage of those who went to the ends of the earth, and consider what it looks like now to take the gospel from everywhere, to everywhere.(n)

programme.title: Hour of Power
programme.desc: Since 1970 the Hour of Power has been reaching viewers from around the world. Originally founded by Dr Robert H Schuller, the program became the most-watched religious program in the world, reaching 17 million viewers. Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schuller's grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherd's Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. There is no fuller, richer life than the one that is lived in Christ.(n)

programme.title: Life with Paul De Jong
programme.desc: We like to call it 'soul food'. LIFE TV uses creative illustration, real life stories and biblical teaching to encourage and help viewers discover a greater purpose to their lives.(n)

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.desc: Bayless Conley is a church leader and speaker, known for both his clear presentation of the Bible message and the way he applies it to everyday life. Bayless grew up in Southern California where, during his teenage years, he became involved in a lifestyle of drug and alcohol abuse. After years of searching for truth, and a number of near-death experiences, he found answers and freedom in Jesus when a 12-year-old boy shared God's message of hope with him in a park one day. Bayless' unique background and remarkable story have enabled him to reach a diverse audience globally. Today, the Answers with Bayless Conley broadcast is impacting lives around the world in numerous languages. Bayless is the founding and senior pastor of Cottonwood Church in Orange County, California. He and his wife, Janet, are the parents of three grown children, and enthusiastic grandparents. Together they passionately pursue life, God, and family. In Answers with Bayless Conley, Bayless offers clear and practical Bible teaching that helps viewers find answers for their life. His passion is to see the truth of God's Word set people free.(n)

programme.title: Joyce Meyer Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.sub-title: E60 The Armour of Righteousness - Part 1
programme.desc: With her no nonsense preaching Joyce Meyer shares practical teaching about living life as a Christian. In an encouraging and supportive way, hear real stories that will challenge you to be the best that you can be. Joyce Meyer is one of the world's leading practical Bible teachers. A New York Times bestselling author, her books have helped millions of people find hope and restoration through Jesus Christ. In this series you will see her powerful preaching from her home church, as well as the crusades around the world, and intriguing interviews with a variety of guests. Be inspired and encouraged this week, with Joyce Meyer on Enjoying Everyday Life.(n)

programme.title: Precious Memories
programme.sub-title: E16 The Best Of The Crabb Family
programme.desc: Join Bill and Gloria Gaither and their special guests for a great sing-along of old time gospel music. Relax, as they journey back to a time when things were simple and lifetime memories were made. Howard & Vestal Goodman, James and Jimmy Blackwood, The Nelons, The Talleys, and other renowned Christian recording artists join Bill and Gloria in these nostalgia-filled video journeys.(n)

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: Pam Rhodes visits the historic city of Winchester, once the capital of England. She visits a world-famous potting shed and introduces soprano Elin Manahan Thomas and classic hymns from Winchester Cathedral, including Crown Him With Many Crowns and Great Is Thy Faithfulness.(n)

programme.title: Praise, Prayer and Preaching
programme.desc: Praise, Prayer & Preaching is recorded live at Wesley Mission, Sydney, Australia. Rev. Keith Garner, an inspiring and gifted teacher who not only wants to influence the world, but to change the world, encourages and challenges us every week to live out our faith in a practical way.(n)

programme.title: Wesley Impact
programme.desc: Wesley Impact! (formerly Rise & Shine) is a half hour Christian television program. Hosted by Rev. Keith Garner, this series looks at the work of Wesley Mission at the grass roots with personal good-news stories shared by clients and staff within the various support services and programs they provide which are helping people get their lives back on track. Episodes also include featured guests from Australia and around the world, sharing their personal and inspirational stories of tackling life's challenges to emerge with a message of hope, victory and courage. Featuring an in-house band, led by Music Director Craig Gower, showcasing some of Australia's leading Christian artists, Wesley Impact! has everything you need.(n)

programme.title: Quick Study
programme.desc: Quick Study is a daily 30 minute program designed to encourage viewers to read and understand the bible. The idea behind the show is to motivate as many people as possible to begin to read and discover the worlds best selling book, the Bible. When they begin to understand it they begin to form an accurate picture of God in their lives.(n)

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
programme.desc: The postal detectives work against the clock decoding a letter to rescue a soldier in Afghanistan and reunite her with her family, while Rita competes for the National Miss Special Delivery title in Washington, DC.(n)

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: E71 Prosper Through Prophetic Preaching Pt3
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.(n)

programme.title: Bible Man
programme.sub-title: E12 Say Goodbye to the Grand Duchess of Greed Part 1
programme.desc: Miles Peterson had everything: Money, power, fame...Until he lost it. Then Miles finds the power of God and harnesses that power to become Bibleman.(n)

programme.title: Adventures Sea Kids
programme.desc: Freddy, David, Melissa and their friends find themselves navigating the rough waters of peer pressure, temptation, fear, forgiving others, listening to parents, dealing with bullies, lack of self-esteem, and so much more. Children can relate to these adorable characters and their problematic situations. Each action-packed, beautifully animated episode, shows the characters praying to Jesus, asking Him for guidance and wisdom. The Sea Kids will help transform the heart and mind of every child as they learn how to tangibly live out the biblical principles being taught while building a strong foundation in Jesus.(n)

programme.title: Tune Time
programme.desc: Kids don't just watch TuneTime, they get involved. They will dance, they will sing, they will laugh, they'll yell out key words and phrases to help solve problems and all the while they'll discover the love and goodness of God.(n)

programme.title: PowerPoint with Dr. Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.(n)

programme.title: Sue Thomas: F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of FBI agent Sue Thomas in Washington DC. She's one hard-headed, soft-hearted woman whose talent for reading lips helps crack crimes and bag the bad guys in places listening devices can't penetrate. With her hearing-ear dog, Levi, Sue's a glutton for jeopardy - and there's (almost) nothing she won't do to bring notorious criminals to justice. This remarkable, edge-of-your-seat drama is an inspiring tribute to the ability of the human spirit to overcome adversity and achieve great things. Inspired by a true story.(n)

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart follows the adventures of Elizabeth Thatcher, a young teacher accustomed to her high-society life. She receives her first classroom assignment in Hope Valley, a small town in Western Canada. There, life is simple - but often fraught with challenges. Elizabeth charms most everyone in Hope Valley, especially young mountie Jack Thornton. Elizabeth must learn the ways of the Canadian frontier if she wishes to thrive in the rural west on her own but she soon learns that friendship and community are the source of love and life.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Up Bates
programme.desc: Gil and Kelly Bates, and their 19 kids, are buzzing about the latest addition to their family; the first Bates grandchild! As the girls prepare to throw a huge baby shower to celebrate, Alyssa gives the family some surprising news of her own and an accident leaves the family shaken.(n)

programme.title: Convocation
programme.desc: Convocation at Liberty University is North America's largest weekly gathering of Christian students, and each year it plays host to more than 80 guest speakers of national significance from every sphere of society. The services, held within the Vines Centre at the University during each semester, connect students with their Creator through passionate worship and powerful messages firmly rooted in Biblical truth.(n)

programme.title: Better Together
programme.desc: A program by women for women...we discuss faith, family, friends, and so much more - no topic is off limits. Find out what happens when real friends get together for real conversations!(n)

programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA; join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church, for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. In every journey we visit animated friends, Teenkle the worm, Larry the Light Bouy, Benny the bottle nose and Dolly the dolphin. Lil' Sailors all over the world will love Capt'n Chuckleberry.(n)

programme.title: OK TV
programme.desc: Powerful, life filled topics are presented in an enjoyable and proven format. Hosts, Brendon and Cathie have poured their 30 years of experience with kids in schools and in ministry and the great goals of the local church into a energetic show that will engage the next generation.(n)

programme.title: Whirl
programme.desc: Whirl is a Bible-based cartoon series about the loveable, sometimes overly-enthusiastic kids of First Second Church. In each episode, the kids tackle a different theme that is central to Christian values. Everything from generosity and forgiveness to doubt and the trinity are explored over the course of the series. And while the issues dealt with in each episode are relatable, the solutions this kooky cast often find are a bit... unconventional. Whether the kids of First Second Church are searching for a hidden sanctum of the church's altar guild, or trying to outsmart robots bent on world domination, these characters will keep the whole family laughing and learning.(n)

programme.title: A Very Tall Man
programme.desc: Gary Hoogvliet, a very tall man, interviews interesting folk, not quite as tall as he, but nevertheless with fascinating and inspiring stories to tell.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Up Bates
programme.sub-title: E14 The Bates Go To Florida
programme.desc: The family hits the road to visit Alyssa and John in Florida.(n)

programme.title: Joan of Arcadia
programme.desc: Millions of people speak to God. What if God spoke back? No one would ever believe Joan Girardi if she told them that God is talking to her. Does Joan have a higher purpose on earth, or are these strange conversations just in her head?(n)

programme.title: To The Ends
programme.desc: What was birthed as a dream in 2009 to bring surfboards and skateboards to children living in poverty around the world quickly grew into a vision far greater; the hope of impacting the world through action sports. Over the last 10 years, Ride Nature has led over 70 international trips, visited 27 different countries, hosted countless events, and given away over 2,000 boards to children living in poverty all around the world. This 10 part film series shares the story of Ride Nature and the lives impacted along the way.(n)

programme.title: New Horizons
programme.sub-title: E68 Set Free to Follow God Pt16
programme.desc: The stories told in the book of Exodus are among the most foundational in the whole of the Bible. God's rescue of his people from slavery is a model for every act of salvation and these events are continually reinterpreted to make sense of God's actions. However, God's interest is not merely in rescuing an oppressed group of people, but to bring them into a life-giving relationship that is part of his biggest plan to renew the whole world.(n)

programme.sub-title: E72 Prosper Through Prophetic Preaching Pt4

programme.title: Facing Darkness
programme.desc: As the Ebola pandemic was sweeping across West Africa in the spring of 2014, one organization was willing to step up and fully commit its people and resources to provide comfort, compassion, and care to the hurting people of Africa ... all in the Name of Jesus. But when the deadly virus infected its own medical personnel, including Dr Kent Brantly, the epic crisis truly hit home for Samaritan's Purse and its leader Franklin Graham. Facing Darkness tells the incredible true story of how - with only faith, determination, and prayer - the ministry moved mountains ... and God performed a miracle!(n)

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: The best-known Christian evangelist of the 20th century, Billy Graham gained world attention in 1949 with a tent revival in downtown Los Angeles that was scheduled for three weeks and lasted six. In the ensuing 55 years and more, 'Billy Graham Crusades' consistently drew audiences of thousands to arenas and stadiums throughout the world.'Classic Crusades' presents the best of the last 35 years of Billy Graham that brought the message of salvation through Jesus Christ to the world. World renowned actors, singers, athletes and ministers share the platform with Dr. Graham. Also often features the famous sounds of the Billy Graham Choir, George Beverly Shea and Cliff Barrows for an hour of blessing and inspiration to all who watch.(n)

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: Glorious Gospel Church has been meeting the needs of the community since 1990. With a vision for a church that is REAL, RELATABLE, ENJOYABLE, LIFE-CHANGING & UPLIFTING, they are committed to providing church services that will enable you to experience church this way. Linked by mutual vision and values, which are based firmly in the Bible and what the Bible teaches, GGC's mandate is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ in a relatable and practical way..(n)

programme.title: The Blessed Life with Robert Morris
programme.desc: Gateway Church is a multicampus, nondenominational church in the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex led by Pastor Robert Morris. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 39,000 active members and six local campuses. Its vision is to see people saved, healed, set free, discipled, equipped, empowered, and serving. Its mission is to help each person at Gateway believe in Jesus, belong to family, become a follower, and build God's kingdom.(n)

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: The 700 Club is a daily magazine programme with news, interviews, lifestyle features and true-life stories from a Christian perspective. including powerful and dramatic testimonies of God touching people's lives. Where does the name The 700 Club come from? When the show started to air more than 50 years ago, founder and host Pat Robertson needed to have just 700 Partners to donate $5 a month to make the programme possible. Those original 700 supporters couldn't have imagined they would start a TV show that is now seen every day in over 200 countries, impacting the nations with the Gospel of Jesus Christ!(n)

programme.title: Torchlighters: Heroes of the Faith
programme.desc: William Tyndale tops King Henry VIII's 'Most Wanted' list in 1535 and is being pursued across Europe by the king's bounty hunters. What is his crime? Murder? Theft? No, none of these. William Tyndale's 'crime' is translating the Bible into English for the common people. Is he willing to risk his life for this cause? Follow William Tyndale's adventures as he works in secret, moving from town to town as a fugitive to avoid capture. Friends and allies help him along, but enemies may be lurking around any corner. Come along and see whether this mighty man completes his task before the king's men close in on him.(n)

programme.title: Holy Moly
programme.desc: Holy Moly turns the Bible into a living, breathing colouring book that will delight children of all ages. Eyes will be fixed on the screen, observing how God is at work in the story when colour is introduced to an otherwise black-and-white world. Rather than dialogue, the series focuses on the Biblical characters' actions and emotions to help audiences of any language or background immediately relate to and remember these enriching stories.(n)

programme.title: Be That
programme.desc: What does it mean to be 'The Provider' in the context of family? What comes to mind? Every family functions differently and the answer will depend on individuals own experience. Whatever it might be, has fulfilling this role ever just been about who goes to work, how many hours they do or bringing home that pay cheque? Be That thinks it's worth reconsidering what it means to be 'The Provider' for a family. Beneath the surface of it all, does it requires a lot more vulnerability and availability than we've been accustomed to?(n)

programme.title: A Very Tall Man
programme.desc: Gary Hoogvliet, a very tall man, interviews interesting folk, not quite as tall as he, but nevertheless with fascinating and inspiring stories to tell.(n)

programme.title: About Miracles
programme.desc: Four dramatic true stories about modern day miracles. A man is robbed, then shot in the head at point-blank range and left for dead. A woman hears a voice telling her to go to the ER even though she has no physical symptoms. A student has just one week to raise thousands of dollars for a mission trip. A baby is injured in a car accident and gradually loses his sight while his parents pray for healing. About Miracles offers the facts surrounding these true stories and concludes that sometimes...the only logical explanation is God.(n)

programme.title: Always Good News
programme.desc: All around the world the power of the Gospel is shared by ordinary people facing extraordinary obstacles. Believers in every part of the world face unique challenges. Travel around the globe to Estonia, Colombia and Taiwan with Franklin Graham as they witness the impact and change in lives as the host the Festival of Hope.(n)

programme.title: Planetshakers TV
programme.desc: Planetshakers' mission is to 'empower a generation to win a generation'. This Christian youth movement began as an annual conference in Melbourne that saw thousands of people of different ages, backgrounds and nationalities from all over the globe gather together. The movement grew and grew into an international ministry and church. Russell and Sam Evans are the senior pastors of Planetshakers City Church and Planetshakers TV showcases weekly teaching and music.(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Journey Presents
programme.sub-title: E79 Lake Eyre and the Water of Life
programme.desc: The Incredible Journey is passionate about sharing the good news of Christ and preparing people for the soon coming of Jesus, offering Biblical answers to life's questions. Pastor Gary Kent is an archaeologist who has excavated numerous sites throughout Israel and Jordan. As an internationally-acclaimed speaker and TV presenter, he has spoken and produced numerous documentaries on subjects including the Bible, Bible prophecy, world events and natural health. His passion is to share the good news of Jesus' imminent return.(n)

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: E73 Inherit God's Promises By Faith, Not Works Pt1
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches dynamic messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God. His desire is to help believers understand grace and how greatly blessed, highly favoured and deeply loved they are by their heavenly Father.(n)

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, USA; join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church, for this program of powerful music and empowering preaching. programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything, from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.(n)

programme.title: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Stranded in a hotel on a storm-swept island, Katrin has a fun-filled flirt with Peter, the only other guest. The next day, Katrin is relieved to return home to her loving marriage. Until Peter appears at her friend’s wedding - with his wife.(n)

programme.title: Modern Murder: Nemesis
programme.desc: When a famous restaurateur is murdered, Gorniak and Hennrichs delve into the world of organised crime. However, investigations lead them to a darker and more frightening possibility - his wife and children. Could a young boy murder his father?(n)

programme.title: Halfway
programme.desc: Stef moves into his new house in the wake of a bitter divorce. Soon, he realises he is not quite as alone as he had hoped to be, since a scantily-clad phantom - who is none other than the previous owner of the house - comes to haunt his daily existence.(n)

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Third Girl
programme.desc: Dusseldorf is in a panic when a nurse's body is found, killed in a manner similar to three murders years ago. A serial killer from a cold case seems to have re-surfaced, and investigations lead Helen and her partner Georgi to suspects from among their own.(n)

programme.title: Paris La Blanche
programme.desc: In this parable of migration, Rekia, 70, leaves Kabylie for Paris to fetch her husband Nour home. Nour has been sustaining the family from abroad for 40 years. Finding help in new friends, she finds Nour, but he is a changed man.(n)

programme.title: Un Amore Cosi Grande
programme.desc: In Verona, Vladimir is in search of his father who abandoned him years ago. However, he winds up falling for the wealthy Veronica. Through their turbulent relationship and a chance meeting with Il Volo, he discovers his one true gift - his voice.(n)

programme.title: The Owners
programme.desc: Forced to leave the city, three siblings return to their family home in a quiet village. But the District Officer's alcoholic brother has been squatting there for 10 years and the police are making their lives hell as they fight to get their house back.(n)

programme.title: The Vegetarian
programme.desc: Krishna, son of a Brahmin, works on a farm in Italy but never forgets his Indian roots. He lives in peace with the locals and respects the nature and animals. However, when an unproductive cow has to be killed, he is forced to confront his conscience.(n)

programme.title: Eastern Friesland Killer
programme.desc: A quiet vacation spot is shaken when one by one the top executives of an organisation for the mentally disabled is brutally murdered. As police investigate, they discover shady deals, massive funds and destructive fury that threaten to claim more lives.(n)

programme.desc: Quadriplegic Jan wants to be discharged from the clinic against medical advice. Doctor-turned-attorney Dr. Engel fights his doctor, who happens to be her father. Meanwhile she also takes on a dodgy clinic more intent on making money than saving lives.(n)

programme.title: Girl On A Bicycle
programme.desc: Paolo, an Italian in Paris, has just proposed to his German girlfriend when he bumps into a pretty French girl. Smitten, Paolo takes some bad advice from a friend and finds his life upside-down with a German fiancee, a French "wife" and two Aussie kids.(n)

programme.title: Land Of Saints
programme.desc: A young magistrate moves to South Italy to defeat the Calabrian Mafia. Appalled by the unsparing brutality of the mafia trade, she appeals to the mafia men's wives and children in her quest to bring peace and justice to the region.(n)

programme.title: Monument to Michael Jackson
programme.desc: In this tragicomedy, a dying Serbian town removes an old Communist monument from its square. To revive tourism and win back his estranged wife, dreamer Marko decides to erect a monument to King of Pop, Michael Jackson. But his plan goes absurdly awry.(n)

programme.title: Love In Saint-Petersburg
programme.desc: When Marie, a sweet and jovial single mother, becomes the new owner of a faltering tourist park, she ends up butting heads with its old manager, the strong-headed Vania. However, their polarity also breeds unexpected romantic tension and tender feelings.(n)

programme.title: Zagros
programme.desc: In Kurdistan, Zagros' happy marriage falters when relatives start questioning his wife's growing modern personality. She soon runs away to Brussels for refuge. He follows her out of love, but the burden of tradition and patriarchy never leaves him.(n)

programme.title: Modern Murder: Tender Trap
programme.desc: A young student is strangled in a car by a collective of men who had allegedly been conned by her through a dating website. Gorniak and Sieland go undercover to secretly bait the suspects, but soon discover that danger lurks.(n)

programme.title: Radiogram
programme.desc: Living in communist Bulgaria, Ahmet loves rock music even though it's banned. When his radio malfunctions, his father Ali sets out on a 100-kilometre journey to buy him a new one. Ali's journey becomes at once both a symbol of resistance and the power of music.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Ms. Heller: Silhouette
programme.desc: A sniper strikes downtown right before a bank is robbed and three hostages are taken, among them, Inspector Heller. Holed up in a factory, they demand 7-million Euros. While investigations go on, shots ring out at the factory and one of the hostages dies.(n)

programme.title: The Door
programme.desc: In this mystery thriller, David loses his bearings when his daughter dies and his wife leaves him. One day, he finds a door which gives him the chance to turn back time and redo life. But it soon turns out that not everything in his past is as it seems.(n)

programme.title: The Daddy Offensive
programme.desc: Markus, who has always wanted a family, is overjoyed when his holiday fling Lena becomes pregnant. Her father strongly disapproves of him and when the former turns up for his birthday, a hilarious showdown ensues between Markus and his future father-in-law.(n)

programme.title: El Cinco
programme.desc: When a Captain of a C division Argentinian football team is expelled, he has to grapple with the fact that, at his age, there is no hope of reviving his football career. Having played for years with neither fame nor fortune, he has to rebuild his life.(n)

programme.title: The Cliffs Murder
programme.desc: The posh resort of Etretat is in turmoil when the body of one of its most-loved resident, Gilbert, is found dead. Investigations rule out suicide and police suspect either a bloody family drama or a sinister, esoteric crime related to the local abbey.(n)

programme.title: DOM
programme.desc: The Shamanovs are at their large house in the middle of the steppes for a family meeting when long-lost elder brother Victor appears after a 25-year absence. Family secrets surface, but no one knows that Victor is really escaping his dark past and killers.(n)

programme.title: Chocolate Kisses
programme.desc: Starring Luca Argentero (Eat Pray Love), this romantic adventure is about a chocolatier and his womanising assistant who find their relationship strained when the young man falls for his boss' lovely daughter. Can a little chocolate help?(n)

programme.title: Chucks
programme.desc: A tender coming-of-age story, punk-lover Mae takes to the streets after her brother dies, wearing his old Converse shoes, living off beer and painting graffiti. When she is sentenced to do social work, she meets and falls for Paul who is dying of AIDS.(n)

programme.title: The Door

programme.desc: The sequel to 'The Maze Runner' finds the 'Gladers' venturing out into a post-apocalyptic wasteland searching for clues about the organisation that trapped them. 本片是《移动迷宫》系列电影的第二集，剧中汤玛士和伙伴冒险进去末日后的荒凉之地，寻找关于之前囚禁他们的邪恶组织的线索。.(n)

programme.title: 异形3 Alien 3
programme.desc: Caused by an alien stowaway, the ship carrying Ellen Ripley crashes onto a remote and inhabited ore refinery after escaping from the alien planet. 在这出续集电影中，随着雷普莉降落监狱星球的异形，开始杀害当地的罪犯，甚至在雷普莉身上寄生…….(n)

programme.title: 人类升级 Upgrade
programme.desc: An inventor gives a paralysed victim of a brutal mugging an upgrade on his body, including the the ability to relentlessly claim vengeance against the culprits. 一名发明家说服因遭到暴徒抢劫而全身瘫痪的男子「升级」身体，让他得以马不停蹄的向凶手报仇。.(n)

programme.title: 温特的故事:泳不放弃2 Dolphin Tale 2
programme.desc: The team at Clearwater Marine Hospital needs to find a new companion for Winter the dolphin soon before it is forced to move to another aquarium. 海洋医院的团队必须在海豚温特被迫转到别间水族馆之前，帮牠找到新的同伴。.(n)

programme.desc: Lord Voldemort has returned, but few want to believe it; in fact, the Ministry of Magic is doing everything it can to keep everyone from knowing the truth. 最精采的哈利波特第五集来了！！返回霍格华兹的哈利，发现包括魔法部在内的许多巫师，都不相信佛地魔回来了。魔法部还派来一位新老师监控全校,但黑暗的手即将掳获猎物....(n)

programme.title: 进击的大佬 Grudge Match
programme.desc: Thirty years after their last title fight, two retired boxers and lifelong rivals decide to step into the ring once more to settle an old score once and for all. 两名退休的拳击宿敌在30年后，决定回到拳击场上，最后一次一决胜负。.(n)

programme.title: 关键报告 Minority Report
programme.desc: A man discovers that he has been identified by the police department as a future murderer and now has to make a run for his life. 一名男子发现自己被警方列为未来的谋杀犯，为了求生，他必须尽快找出想消灭他的幕后黑手。.(n)

programme.title: 派对人生 Life Of The Party
programme.desc: A newly divorced mother returns to college to complete her degree, and ends up bonding with her daughter's friends. 刚离婚的单亲妈妈重回校园完成学业，和女儿的好友们建立起友谊。.(n)

programme.title: 丁丁历险记 The Adventures Of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends go on an exciting treasure hunt. 丁丁和朋友发现哈朵克船长祖先的沈船踪迹，于是展开一趟寻宝之旅。.(n)

programme.title: 不可能的任务 Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Secret agent Ethan Hunt races against time to find the mole who threatens to undermine the CIA's operations. Stars Tom Cruise. 你是否要接受这个任务，和汤姆克鲁斯一同进行刺激的冒险之旅？汤姆克鲁斯在本片饰演超级情报员伊森杭特，被控出卖同僚并以高额代价泄漏最高机密。.(n)

programme.title: 星际异攻队2 Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2
programme.desc: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill’s true parentage. 星际异攻队在挖掘彼得奎尔真实身份的同时，为了守护他们刚建立的如家人般的团队，大伙必须合力奋战。.(n)

programme.title: 丧尸未逝 The Dead Don't Die
programme.desc: In the sleepy small town of Centerville, the dead rise from their graves and savagely attack and feast on the living – and the citizens must battle for their survival. 在寂静的森特威尔小镇，丧尸从坟墓中爬出，残暴攻击与追捕人类，为了求生，居民们拼命奋战。.(n)

programme.desc: In the second instalment of the Twilight franchise, the romance between mortal Bella Swan and vampire Edward Cullen grows more intense as ancient secrets threaten to destroy them. 在《暮光之城》续集中，身为人类的贝拉与吸血鬼爱德华的恋情愈来愈热烈，古老的秘密却威胁要摧毁他们。.(n)

The Ingalls and the Garveys go to the farms around town to let everyone know of their plans to restore the town to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S05
programme.desc: Laura Ingalls becomes jealous of the extra attention her father pays to new family member, Albert, especially after the boy is given a new calf to raise for the county fair, and asked to call Charles "Pa".(n)

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S05
programme.desc: When Harriet Oleson's cousin Sterling Murdock comes to town, he brings his newspaper business with him. Everyone is initially excited about this, but trouble ensues when Murdock gives gossipmonger Harriet her own column - and allows her the freedom to write whatever she wants.(n)

programme.title: The Nanny S05
programme.desc: Concerned about not only his own financial security, but the financial security of his brother and sister, Maxwell wants to have Fran sign a pre-nuptial agreement.(n)

programme.title: The Nanny S05
programme.desc: Fran is upset when she knew Maxwell dated Marla Maples before. But she becomes frantic when Maxwell's brother Nigel arrives to be Maxwell's best man, as Fran almost ran off with Nigel once.(n)

programme.title: The Nanny S05
programme.desc: Fran moves to her mom's because she doesn't want Maxwell to see her 24 hours before the wedding. Maxwell's sister arrives for the wedding and says their mother is not coming because she doesn't like Fran.(n)

programme.title: The Nanny S05
programme.desc: Fran spends her last night as a single woman at her mom's house. On the wedding day, Maxwell tells Fran the wonderful things she has and he will never get bored with them. Fran and Maxwell finally marry!(n)

programme.title: The Nanny S06
programme.desc: Fran and Maxwell get washed up on a desert island after falling off the cruise ship, and Fran immediately starts to complain about the primitive conditions on the island, which puts Maxwell in a bad mood.(n)

programme.desc: Lucy, realizing her need for glasses but too vain to wear them, obtains contact lenses and is wearing them while she and Viv bake and ice a chocolate cake for Mrs. Mooney's charity sale at her husband's bank.(n)

programme.title: The Lucy Show S03
programme.desc: After Mr. Mooney has left his talking parakeet, Greenback, with Lucy and Viv while his house is being painted, the girls inadvertently leave the cage door open and Greenback flies out of the home.(n)

programme.title: The Lucy Show S03
programme.desc: When Lucy's son Jerry announces that a penny given to him by Viv is rare and worth 50 cents, the two women immediately seize his album of coins see a new source of income happening.(n)

programme.title: The Lucy Show S03
programme.desc: Lucy and Viv have taken jobs selling vacuum cleaners, but Lucy is a complete failure. Believing she can make her first sale by hounding Mr. Mooney until he gives in, she invades his home with a vacuum cleaner.(n)

programme.title: The Lucy Show S03
programme.desc: Mr. Mooney commits a grievous error. He entrusts to Lucy and Viv a ceramic cat he plans to give his wife as a surprise birthday gift but is shattered into smithereens when the girls drop the package.(n)

programme.desc: Based on a Stephen King novel, Carrie is the story of a girl brought up, almost in isolation, by her psychotically religious mother Margaret. programme.title: Descendants Of The Sun
programme.desc: Every dream is bought for a fortune, and some say that happiness is followed by success. Those who compromise only to succeed are extolled, and those who fight for justice are ridiculed for being reckless. It's a world in which nobody is ashamed of saying "Greed is good". Thus we need a hero.(n)

programme.desc: Every dream is bought for a fortune, and some say that happiness is followed by success. Thus we need a hero.(n)

programme.title: Almost Genius S1
programme.desc: Almost Genius is a self-contained, half-hour comedy series that celebrates the people, places and things that try so hard to succeed but come up just a bit short. Hosted by April Richardson and Chris Fairbanks, the show features comedians and performers digitally inserted into viral videos to comment on and congratulate people for their bravery and ingenuity in snatching defeat from the jaws of victory. But Almost Genius doesn't mock, because as everyone knows, almost is awesome…and genius.(n)

programme.title: World's Funniest S1
programme.desc: A hilarious new global television clip show series that presents a unique themed view of completely relatable and entertaining real-life moments caught on video. Each episode focuses on a different endearing and funny aspect of day-to-day life… from Celebrations to Fun in the Sun, Kids and Pets to Weddings, Hanging Around the House to A Walk on the Wild Side, Getting There is Half the Fun to Wild on the Water, The Games People Play to The World of the Weird and many, many more.(n)

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15
programme.desc: Pull back the curtain on 20 of the dumbest performers ever to take the stage - from an angry Elmo to a lion trainer who almost becomes dinner and a woman who crushes watermelons. programme.title: World's Dumbest S15

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15
programme.desc: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose. Takingthese criminals to task is our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Tonya Harding, Jared Logan, and Kevin McCaffrey.(n)

programme.desc: Monica and Chandler travel to Texas to meet a young pregnant woman, Erica Simmons (ANNA FARIS - "Scary Movie" films), who is considering allowing them to adopt her child when it's born.(n)

programme.title: Almost Genius S1
programme.desc: Almost Genius is a self-contained, half-hour comedy series that celebrates the people, places and things that try so hard to succeed but come up just a bit short. Hosted by April Richardson and Chris Fairbanks, the show features comedians and performers digitally inserted into viral videos to comment on and congratulate people for their bravery and ingenuity in snatching defeat from the jaws of victory. But Almost Genius doesn't mock, because as everyone knows, almost is awesome…and genius.(n)
